items.name: Zahndethus' Cassock
explicitMods: 50% chance on Block to create Consecrated Ground
flavourText: When dead men rise and darkness falls
Only faith can be your walls
Walls of Light, not of brick
Twice as strong and twice as thick

explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 31 or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Spells directly
Casts Supported Spells when you take a total of 440 Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, making their attacks and spells less effective.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have 20% reduced Accuracy Rating
Cursed enemies have 20% reduced Critical Strike Chance
Cursed enemies have 20% reduced Critical Strike Multiplier
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Lifesprig
explicitMods: +1 to Level of Socketed Spell Gems
Regenerate 7 Life over 1 second for each Spell you Cast
flavourText: From the smallest seeds
To the tallest redwoods,
Life endures in Wraeclast.
